ygData.subject: Well I think it is a new item for jewelers if any out there

ygData.messageBody:
I found a moonstone in qeynos. If ya all need it read below



S
P

il

r





SPACE #*$(#^%#^#*^$#&^%#&^%#&^#&%&#^%(#&^




Ok so you must like spoilers:) I am a bard of teh 15 circle of enlightenment and i did the gnoll fang quest in qeynos. Hey they were sitting in the bank collecting dust. I was expecting to receive a few cp but to my surprise fer every fang turned in you get a moonstone. Now this is a new item to me and all the jewelers in town at the time. I did not let them know how to obtain because aminly , THEY WERE NOT BARDS heheheheh. But i sold two fer 10 plat a piece. Not bad fer killing a gnoll. If any body knows what these can ya let me know:)


Tribe
Wrath of Dragonclaw Clan currently UNKNOWN GUILD on prexus
